Author: theprincessofpirates
Text: I'm working on my body image but it's been really difficult. This has helped me though.

Author: phmwls
Text: im sorry if i don’t have the right words to say, but there’s a saying that goes, “those who matter won’t care and those who care don’t matter” people who love you do not your weight or your body or anything, they see you and the best way i can explain it is when you see a loved one u see them and their soul and that’s how they see u. u are more than your body and you don’t have to be your biggest enemy. it’s okay to love yourself. the thing you are trying to run away from is not actually your body, it’s the negative thoughts you have about your body. and you can work on those thoughts. if you want someone to talk to my dms are open.
